static void AddFileBody ( const string &  outFile,
int  maxProbeSetNameLength,
const list< list< string >> &  data,
const vector< string > &  extraColTypes 
) [static]

Adds the genotype results to the CHP file. This function uses the buffer writer object to write the data to the CHP file.

Parameters:
outFile The name of the output CHP file.
maxProbeSetNameLength The maximum length of the probe set names.
data The data from the input file.
extraColTypes The types (float, int, ubyte) of the extra columns.

static void CreateFileWithHeader ( const string &  execId,
const string &  celFile,
const string &  outFile,
const vector< string > &  extraColNames,
const vector< string > &  extraColTypes,
int  numEntries,
int  maxProbeSetNameLength,
const string &  algName,
const string &  algVersion,
const string &  chipType,
const string &  programName,
const string &  programVersion,
const string &  programCompany,
const vector< string > &  paramNames,
const vector< string > &  paramValues,
const vector< string > &  sumNames,
const vector< string > &  sumValues,
const vector< string > &  extraNames,
const vector< string > &  extraValues 
) [static]

Create a "multi-data" CHP file with just the header information. The remainder of the file will be created at a later time using the buffer writer technique. The CHP file will contain only "genotyping" results.

Parameters:
execId The execution identifier. This identifier is used to identify the batch run that created the CHP files.
celFile The full path to the parent CEL file. The header of the CEL file is copied to the CHP file.
outFile The name of the output CHP file.
extraColNames The names of the extra data columns. Should not include probe set name, call and confidence columns.
extraColTypes The types (float, int, ubyte) of the extra columns.
numEntries The number of rows (entries) of results to store in the CHP file.
maxProbeSetNameLength The maximum length of the probe set names.
algName The name of the algorithm used to create the results.
algVersion The algorithm version.
chipType the chip type, also known as the probe array type.
programName The name of the program used to create the CHP file.
programVersion The version of the program.
programCompany The company or institution who developed the CHP creating software.
paramNames A list of parameter names to store in the CHP file header.
paramValues A list of parameter values to store in the CHP file header.
sumNames A list of summary statistic names to store in the CHP file header.
sumValues A list of summary statistic values to store in the CHP file header.
